title: Timekeeper

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Decorate (Day): Mount one of two clocks at a player's house.
- Midnight Strike (Night, 3 uses): One of the players with a clock is able to make up to three night actions. The other will be unable to make any action.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Players will know if they have a clock at the beginning of each night.

desc:
Post 1139
*Warden of time. Life and death at every tick.*
